titles.title: To amend the Servicemembers Civil Relief Act to preempt any squatter's rights established by State law regarding real property owned by a member of the uniformed services.
To amend the Servicemembers Civil Relief Act to preempt any squatter's rights established by State law regarding real property owned by a member of the uniformed services.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held
